title: Very disappointing
body: Very disappointing. The glass is extremely thin and unlikely to survive much of a knock so you have to be very, very careful when cleaning it. The filter is wide but shallow and so if you want two cups of coffee once you've put a couple of scoops of coffee in there's barely any room to add the water so the whole process takes forever and by the time it's filtered through it's barely warm and even the first cup needs to go in the microwave. After you've drunk it you'll be left with a thin sludge of grounds in the bottom of the cup that'll need rinsing out before you pour the second cup of stone cold coffee. To make matters worse the spout is terrible and really not much more accurate than no spout at all. For me, the only plus is the handle which makes it easier to use and I definitely wouldn't recommend.
